title: 1.12BC端跨服sponge蹦客户端
author: qq2415786013
txt_content: 1.12BC端跨服sponge蹦客户端 偶尔能进跨服成功  就是重登录服跨到sponge服

replies.author: qq2415786013

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 PY狗 于 2018-7-19 16:09 编辑 

BC里的config找到forge_support: false设置为true

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content: 如果没有这个，先备份原来的config再删除加载新的config还是没有就更新最新版https://ci.md-5.net/job/BungeeCord/

replies.author: qq2415786013
replies.txt_content: 不使用STP插件 使用/server 指令跨服
